person.persName: Junius R. Ward (Very wealthy Washington County, MS planter)

body.p: Washington County, Mississippi, planter and livestock breeder. Scott County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Ward and Sarah Johnson Ward. Married to Matilda Viley Ward. Planter in Mississippi and Kentucky.
